ComicInfo.Summary: David is still hanging around and his profession of love enrages a fragile Katchoo but his simple charm leads her to lightly kiss him much to the surprise of Francine. A call from the home in Canada where Emma is sends Katchoo to the airport again much to Francine's frustration at her friends secretive life. In Canada Katchoo confesses that she has feelings for David to Emma. As it starts to snow Emma passes-away. David and Francine arrive at the home and wait for their friend unannounced.
ComicInfo.Title: Echoes of Home
